statements: DELETE FROM data_pipeline WHERE loaded_flag = FALSE;
DELETE FROM data_pipeline WHERE id = 1 AND loaded_flag = false;
DELETE FROM data_pipeline WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND data_type = 'csv';
DELETE FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'API' AND source_name = 'Sales Data';
DELETE FROM data_transformations WHERE transformation_name = 'Data Cleaning';
DELETE FROM data_load WHERE load_name = 'Daily Sales Data Load'
DELETE FROM pipeline_metadata_table WHERE pipeline_name = 'ETL Pipeline A';
